abstract: Oracle has teamed with Hewlett-Packard, rather than traditional partners Sun and Dell, on new data warehousing hardware.
snippet: Oracle has teamed with Hewlett-Packard, rather than traditional partners Sun and Dell, on new data warehousing hardware.
lead_paragraph: Oracle dealt a blow Wednesday to its longtime ally Sun Microsystems by “entering the hardware business” in tandem with Hewlett-Packard.
